WildMagic_SD.synopsis: At camp, Shadowheart experiences a brief flare-up of mysterious magical energy, She reacts with alarm an utters the name of Shar, her patron goddess. If other party members are present, they ask her what just happened.
WildMagic_SD.how_to_trigger: Bypass the scene trigger for FOR_Village_OM_ShadowHeart_COM, then go to camp after having reached the goblin camp. CFM will be added to the camp night queue (may not trigger immediately)

WildMagic_SD_0.speaker: Narrator
WildMagic_SD_0.text: *The day is over at last. Rest awaits... yet you cannot shake the sensation that something is off.*
WildMagic_SD_0.context: NodeContext: SH concerned expression (wound flare-up incoming)

WildMagic_SD_7.speaker: Narrator
WildMagic_SD_7.text: *Intense pain blossoms from the wound on your hand, throughout your whole body. A fragmented image comes to you - a hooded figure, admonishing you for resting.*
WildMagic_SD_7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart reacts to the pain of the incurable wound in her right hand. She raises the hand and grimaces in pain. After a brief moment the pain passes and she lowers her hand, face relaxing, returning to default pose.

WildMagic_SD_4.speaker: Narrator
WildMagic_SD_4.text: *Is Lady Shar punishing you? Or perhaps testing you? Is it the tadpole, or a curse? You cannot say.*
WildMagic_SD_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Default pose/Shadowheart no longer being affected by the pain of the incurable wound.

WildMagic_SD_8.speaker: Shadowheart
WildMagic_SD_8.text: Silently petition Lady Shar for guidance.

WildMagic_SD_3.speaker: Narrator
WildMagic_SD_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Default pose/Shadowheart no longer being affected by the pain of the incurable wound.

WildMagic_SD_2.speaker: Shadowheart
WildMagic_SD_2.text: It was nothing. Put it out of your mind.

WildMagic_SD_1.speaker: Narrator
WildMagic_SD_1.text: *But was it truly nothing?  The pain gripped you tight, robbing you of all composure for a moment...*
WildMagic_SD_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Default pose/Shadowheart no longer being affected by the pain of the incurable wound.

WildMagic_SD_5.speaker: Narrator
WildMagic_SD_5.text: *In any case, you must persevere without question. The Dark Lady will reveal all to you, when the time is right.*
